Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Includes an advisory committee within the definition of a public body for purposes of the open meetings law
Summary: Includes an advisory committee within the definition of a public body for purposes of the open meetings law.
LawCode: Amd ยง102, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the definition of a public body pursuant to the open meetings law
